setting.label: Segment Keywords to Watch For
setting.default: intro,recap,prologue,epilogue,ad,ads,sponsor,sponsors,commercial,commercials,outro,credits,preview,next time on,next on,sneak peek,last time on,last on,previously on,closing,ending
setting.tooltip: Comma-separated list of chapterstrings (case-insensitive) the skipper should monitor.

setting.label: Always Skip These
setting.tooltip: Subset of your segment keywords that should skip automatically.

setting.label: Ask to Skip These
setting.default: intro,recap,segment,preview,next time on,next on,sneak peek,last time on,last on,previously on
setting.tooltip: Subset that should prompt you before skipping.

setting.label: Never Skip These
setting.tooltip: Subset to always play, never skip.

setting.label: Ignore unmapped EDL actions
setting.tooltip: Skippy will ignore any EDL segment whose action type is not explicitly mapped in edl_action_mapping. This includes Kodi's internal action types and any unknown or custom types without a defined label. If set to false it will fall back to label 'Segment'.

setting.label: Skip overlapping segments
setting.tooltip: Configurable overlap detection to help avoid redundant or conflicting skips

category.label: Customize Skip Dialog Look and Behavior

setting.label: Show Progress Bar in Skip Dialog
setting.tooltip: Hide or show the progress bar while a skipable segment is active.

setting.label: Skip Dialog Highlight Style
setting.tooltip: Choose the highlight style for focused buttons in the Skip Dialog.

setting.label: Major Rewind Threshold (Seconds)
setting.tooltip: If playback jumps backward more than this threshold, skip prompts will reset. Helps avoid false triggers from buffering or auto-rewind addons.

setting.label: Skip Dialog Position
setting.tooltip: Choose which corner of the screen the Skip Dialog appears in during playback.

setting.label: Enable Missing Segment File Toast for TV Episodes
setting.tooltip: Show a notification if the metadata file (chapters.xml or .edl) cannot be found or read for the current episode.

setting.label: Enable Missing Segment File Toast for Movies
setting.tooltip: Show a notification if the metadata file (chapters.xml or .edl) cannot be found or read for the current movie.

setting.label: Enable overlapping segment toast if found in segment file
setting.tooltip: Show a notification if the metadata file (chapters.xml or .edl) has overlapping segments.

setting.label: Enable Verbose Logging
setting.tooltip: Turn this on for verbose logging in the kodi.log file and for debugging.
